ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2001_01_10: Hey there. Let’s make today another good one!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
What’s up? If you’ve got something on your mind,
I’m all ears.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey there! Let’s have ourselves another bright day
filled with smiles, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Oh yeah, I had something to give you.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I wasn’t sure what you’re into, but I hope you
like it.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2102_01_10: Hey! It’s a surprise present from yours truly!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2102_02_10: Go ahead and take it! I like making people happy.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I brought you a little something to make you
happy, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
Well? How’d good ol’ Rika here do with her
gift-giving?
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2103_03_10: If you liked that, I can give you more next time!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I’ve got something I’ve been waiting forever to 
tell you about!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Whoa! A present? Wasn’t expecting that!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2301_02_10: How’d you know I love surprises?
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Let’s call it here for today. I’ll talk to you again
later!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Nahaha! You really are fun to talk to!
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8201_2401_02_10: Let’s have another laugh together soon, all right?
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8001_0701_01_10: This is a pretty relaxing place.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Nothing like my stuffy interview room—folks there
can get too nervous to share how they really feel.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Feeling nervous about something is just proof
you’re taking it seriously—that you want to
succeed no matter what.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
So I think it’s good to feel at least a little nervous
before you’re put under the spotlight.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
And aren’t battles that much more exciting when
you’ve got all that pent-up nervous energy?
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
There’s casual Rika, and there’s work-mode Rika.
It’s important that I’m able to switch between
them.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I can code-switch almost instantly depending on
situation.
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
By the way, [Name:PlayerNickname ], which do
you prefer: my casual mode, or my work mode?
ch0302_00_chiri_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
If you like me better in work mode, I can wear
that hat more when we’re hangin’ out!
